data.title: Obituary for Christa J. (Fallon) Koch
authors: Cantelmi Long Funeral Home & On-site Crematory
data.meta_description: Obituary for Christa Koch | Bethlehem, PA | ...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Christa J. (Fallon)  Koch | Cantelmi Long Funeral Homes
data.text:
Christa J. Koch, 47, of Bethlehem, passed away on Friday, May 28, 2021 at St. Lukeâ€™s Hospital, Fountain Hill, surrounded by her loving family. She was the loving wife of Michael R. Koch, with whom she shared over 24 years of marriage. Born in Rutherford, NJ, she was the daughter of the late Richard J. Fallon. Christa was a graduate of Hunterdon Valley High School in Clinton, NJ and she went on to attend Keystone College. Christa and Michael were together for over 27 years. Mike proposed to her New Year's Eve 1995 on a horse and buggy in Central Park NYC. Christa worked as a Graphic Artist and web designer and designed her website preschooleducation.com. She was a past PTC President at Calypso Elementary School . Christa enjoyed spending time with her loving children and family.

She is survived by her loving husband Michael, daughter Haley Jean, and Son Alexander Michael, as well as a multitude of friends and family that loved her dearly.

Services: A Celebration of Life will be held at 2 P.M. on Sunday June 13, 2021 at the Cantelmi Long Funeral Home, 500 Linden Street, Bethlehem, PA 18018 where the family will receive relatives and friends from 1 P.M. until the time of the service. A memory tribute may be placed at www.cantelmifuneralhome.com.
